string-array.item: An English rock band that formed in Liverpool in 1960.

An Irish rock band from Dublin that formed in 1976.

A British rock band formed in London in 1970, known for their elaborate stage shows.

An American rock band formed in Boston in 1970, known for their blues-based rock music.

An American rock band formed in Los Angeles in 1971, known for their harmonious sound.

A British rock band formed in London in 1996, known for their atmospheric sound.
